name: mtg-deck-converter
description: Convert MTG deck screenshots to importable deck lists

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client & npm run dev:bot
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && echo 'âœ… Web app dependencies installed'
scripts.install:bot: cd discord-bot && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'âœ… Discord bot dependencies installed'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run install:bot && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Full setup complete! Check README.md for usage.'
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules discord-bot/__pycache__ discord-bot/venv
scripts.clean:bot: cd discord-bot && rm -rf __pycache__ venv *.log cache temp

author: MTG Deck Converter
